response.overview: Across four countries in the Middle East, forty million Kurds have fought for rights and recognition for decades. Now they lead the struggle against the forces of Islamic State, whilst in the Iraq they've created a business powerhouse. Reporting from across the Kurdish world, this incisive doc asks, are the Kurds closer than ever to securing the international recognition they so desire?
response.title: Kurdistan: Dream Or Reality?

results.name: Kurdistan: Dream Or Reality? | Trailer | Available now
